The conflict heated up on May 1 , when China sent an oil rig to the highly disputed ( and reportedly very oil - rich ) South China Sea .
Vietnam sent ships in response , leading to a tense standoff .
China announced a three - mile exclusion zone around their oil rig , leading both sides to beef up area naval presence and accuse each other of ramming vessels and shooting water cannons .
